title: At A Glance & Outlook Calendar
content: When I tap on the 'At A Glance' widget, my Outlook calendar opens, which is what I want. However, I would also like it to show my upcoming meetings without having to tap it, but it always defaults to my Google Calendar instead. Is it possible have it default to Outlook calendar too?
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
